import React, { Component } from 'react' import DashBoardNavBar from '../DashBoardNav/DashBoardNavBar'; import profile from '../../assets/img/undraw_profile_pic_ic5t.svg' import './DashBoard.css' // Import Datepicker // import moment from 'moment'; // Import Calendar import { YearView, MonthView, Calendar } from 'react-calendar'; import Footer from '../Footer/Footer' import {Table} from 'react-bootstrap'; class DashBoard extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { data:{ firstname : 'Ayooluwa', profilepic: profile, daysremaining: 10, daysavailable: 21, timeofftypes: [ 'Holiday', 'Maternity Leave', 'Paternity Leave', 'Sick Leave (Up to 10 Days)' ], manager: 'Mr Mayowa', department: 'Software Development', status: { approved:'Approved', reject:'Reject' }, }, dates: { january: new Date(2019, 0, 1), february: new Date(2019, 0, 2), march: new Date(2019, 0, 3), april: new Date(2019, 0, 4), may: new Date(2019, 0, 5), june: new Date(2019, 0, 6), july: new Date(2019, 0, 7), august: new Date(2019, 0, 8), september: new Date(2019, 0, 9), october: new Date(2019, 0, 10), november: new Date(2019, 0, 11), december: new Date(2019, 0, 12), } } } navigationView = ({ date, view, label }) => `Current view: ${view}, date: ${date.toLocaleDateString()}`; onChange = date => this.setState({ january: this.state.dates.january, february:this.state.dates.february, march:this.state.dates.march, april: this.state.dates.april, may, june, july, august, september, october, november, december }) render(){ const timeOffTypes = this.state.data.timeofftypes; let offTypes = timeOffTypes.map( (type, index) =>
  • {type}
    • ); return(

    Welcome {this.state.data.firstname}

    Statistics
    Remaining Days

    {this.state.data.daysremaining}

    Days remaining out of {this.state.data.daysavailable} available days.

    Used So Far
    • Holiday: 10
    • Sick Leave: 1 out of 10
    Available Types
      {offTypes}
    Details
    • Manager: {this.state.data.manager}
    • Department: {this.state.data.department}
    Calender

    Upcoming Months

    All Absences
    Type Deducted Dates Approved by Status
    Holiday Table cell Table cell {this.state.data.manager} {this.state.data.status.approved}
    Sick Leave Table cell Table cell {this.state.data.manager} {this.state.data.status.approved}
    Holiday Table cell Table cell {this.state.data.manager} {this.state.data.status.approved}
    ) } } export default DashBoard;
